567.text_zh: 亡语：如果斯塔拉格也在本局对战中死亡，召唤塔迪乌斯。

1021.name: Dart Trap
1021.text: Secret: When an opposing Hero Power is used, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
1021.text_zh: 奥秘：当对方使用英雄技能时，对一个随机敌人造成5点伤害。

1020.name: Desert Camel
1020.text: Battlecry: Put a 1-Cost minion from each deck into the battlefield.
1020.text_zh: 战吼：从双方的牌库中各将一个法力值消耗为（1）点的随从置入战场。

727.name: Glaivezooka
727.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +1 Attack.
727.text_zh: 战吼：使一个随机友方随从获得+1攻击力。

604.name: Stoneskin Gargoyle
604.text: At the start of your turn, restore this minion to full Health.
604.text_zh: 在你的回合开始时，为该随从恢复所有生命值。

603.name: Webspinner
603.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Beast card to your hand.
603.text_zh: 亡语：随机将一张野兽牌置入你的手牌。

602.name: Echoing Ooze
602.text: Battlecry: Summon an exact copy of this minion at the end of the turn.
602.text_zh: 战吼：在回合结束时召唤一个该随从的复制。

158.name: Sunfury Protector
158.text_zh: 战吼：使相邻的随从获得嘲讽。

749.name: Ogre Brute
749.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.

958.name: Refreshment Vendor
958.text: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to each hero.
958.text_zh: 战吼：为每个英雄恢复4点生命值。

48.name: Blood Knight
48.text: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
48.text_zh: 战吼：所有随从失去圣盾。每有一个随从失去圣盾，便获得+3/+3。

951.name: Brave Archer
951.text: Inspire: If your hand is empty, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
951.text_zh: 激励：如果你没有其他手牌，则对敌方英雄造成2点伤害。

950.name: Bear Trap
950.text: Secret: After your hero is attacked, summon a 3/3 Bear with Taunt.
950.text_zh: 奥秘：在你的英雄受到攻击后，召唤一个3/3并具有嘲讽的灰熊。

955.name: The Skeleton Knight
955.text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
955.text_zh: 亡语：揭示双方牌库里的一张随从牌。如果你的牌法力值消耗较大，则将骷髅骑士移回你的手牌。

957.name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
957.text: Inspire: Add a random spell to your hand.
957.text_zh: 激励：随机将一张法术牌置入你的手牌。

956.name: Chillmaw
956.text: Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
956.text_zh: 嘲讽，亡语：如果你的手牌中有龙牌，则对所有随从造成3点伤害。

476.name: Youthful Brewmaster
476.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
476.text_zh: 战吼：使一个友方随从从战场上移回你的手牌。
